languages.text: "Там зародился культ Омниссии, там мы обрели первые откровения. Много тысячелетий назад мы заключили союз с Императором {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терры{/g}, и с тех пор верно служим Империуму, выплачивая дань техникой, оружием, производственными станками и пустотными кораблями".

traits.locale_text: "Сердце нашей церкви находится на мире {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марс{/g}, в Сегментум Солар. Там зародился культ Омниссии, там мы обрели первые откровения. Много тысячелетий назад мы заключили союз с Империумом {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терры{/g}, и с тех пор верно служим ему, выплачивая дань техникой, оружием, производственными станками и пустотными кораблями".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."
languages.original_text: "Там зародился культ Омниссии, там мы обрели первые откровения. Много тысячелетий назад мы заключили союз с Императором {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терры{/g}, и с тех пор верно служим Империуму, выплачивая дань техникой, оружием, производственными станками и пустотными кораблями".

traits.locale_text: "Crimson is the heraldic colour of our central world, {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, located in the Segmentum Solar. That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The heart of our church is located on {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, a world in Segmentum Solar. This is where the cult of Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Imperium of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and serve it ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, industrial lines and void vessels."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Crimson is the heraldic colour of our central world, {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, located in the Segmentum Solar. That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."

That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Imperium of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and we have served it ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and void vessels."

traits.locale_text: "Crimson is the heraldic colour of our central world, {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, located in the Segmentum Solar. That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Ahí es donde se originó el culto al Omnissiah y donde tuvimos las primeras revelaciones. Hace muchos milenios sellamos una alianza con el Emperador de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} y hemos servido al Imperium desde entonces, pagando un tributo de maquinaria, armamento y naves del vacío».
languages.original_text: "That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."

traits.locale_text: «Ahí es donde se originó el culto al Omnissiah y donde tuvimos las primeras revelaciones. Hace muchos milenios sellamos una alianza con el Emperador de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} y hemos servido al Imperium desde entonces, pagando un tributo de maquinaria, armamento y naves del vacío».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「そここそが、万機神崇拝の起源であり、我らが最初の啓示を受けた場所だ。何千年も前に、我々は{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}の皇帝と同盟を組み、それ以来、機械、武器、ヴォイドシップなどを貢ぐことで帝国に仕えてきた」
languages.original_text: "That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."

traits.locale_text: 「そここそが、万機神崇拝の起源であり、我らが最初の啓示を受けた場所だ。何千年も前に、我々は{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}の皇帝と同盟を組み、それ以来、機械、武器、ヴォイドシップなどを貢ぐことで帝国に仕えてきた」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “那里是欧姆尼塞亚教会的发源地，也是我们获得第一次启示的地方。数千年前，我们与{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}的帝皇缔结了盟约，从此为帝国服务，向帝国进贡机器、武器与虚空舰。”
languages.original_text: "That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."

traits.locale_text: “那里是欧姆尼塞亚教会的发源地，也是我们获得第一次启示的地方。数千年前，我们与{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}的帝皇缔结了盟约，从此为帝国服务，向帝国进贡机器、武器与虚空舰。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « C'est le lieu de naissance du culte de l'Omnimessie et l'endroit où nous avons reçu les premières révélations. Nous avons noué une alliance avec l'Empereur de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} il y a des millénaires de cela et depuis, nous servons l'Imperium à qui nous payons un tribut de machines, d'armes et de vaisseaux. »
languages.original_text: "That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le lieu de naissance du culte de l'Omnimessie et l'endroit où nous avons reçu les premières révélations. Nous avons noué une alliance avec l'Empereur de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} il y a des millénaires de cela et depuis, nous servons l'Imperium à qui nous payons un tribut de machines, d'armes et de vaisseaux. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Kult des Omnissiah ist dort entstanden, und dort wurden uns die ersten Offenbarungen geschenkt. Vor vielen Jahrtausenden sind wir ein Bündnis mit dem Imperator von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} eingegangen. Seitdem dienen wir dem Imperium und bezahlen einen Tribut aus Maschinen, Waffen und Raumschiffen."
languages.original_text: "That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."

traits.locale_text: "Der Kult des Omnissiah ist dort entstanden, und dort wurden uns die ersten Offenbarungen geschenkt. Vor vielen Jahrtausenden sind wir ein Bündnis mit dem Imperator von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} eingegangen. Seitdem dienen wir dem Imperium und bezahlen einen Tribut aus Maschinen, Waffen und Raumschiffen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of Terra and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."

languages.text: "Mars, Hermesih tarikatının ortaya çıktığı ve ilk aydınlanmamızın bize bahşedildiği yerdir. Binlerce yıl önce {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} İmparatoru ile müttefik olduk. O gün bugündür İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmiş; ona makine, silah ve uçsuz gemisi temin etmişizdir."
languages.original_text: "That is where the cult of the Omnissiah originated and where we were granted the first revelations. Many millennia ago we made an alliance with the Emperor of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} and have served the Imperium ever since, paying a tribute of machinery, weapons, and voidships."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih tarikatının ortaya çıktığı ve ilk adınlanmamızın bize bahşedildiği yerdir. Binlerce yıl önce {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} İmparator'u ile ittifak olduk ve o gün bugündür İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmiş, ona makine, silah ve uçsuz gemisi temin etmişizdir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
